about_the_game:
Explore procedurally generated ruins looking for treasure in Compass Lost, a cooperative multiplayer third person adventure game that will put your skills and your brains to the test to see if you have what it takes to survive the traps and curses on your path to fame and fortune.

DISCOVER NEWLY UNCONVERED RUINS

A new world of forgotten ruins have been discovered from an ancient civilization deep in the jungle.  You're among the first to explore their depths, solve their mysteries, and tempt fate by taking their valuable treasure. Venture into different sites around the region - overgrown, volcanic, catacombs, and more.  There are even rumors of an entire city made of gold!

BECOME AN ADVENTURER

Whether you decide to journey alone or with others, you wont be exploring empty-handed - assuming you can afford it.  Buy supplies to increase your chances of success: a torch and a medkit can take you a long way if you know what you're doing.  Utilize your journal to keep track of where you've been and to translate ancient writing that can offer clues to the dangers ahead. Leverage your spoils from recent adventures to fund your next expedition or customize your character to stand out from the crowd.

FEATURES

  • Levels procedurally generated so you never explore the same place twice

  • Dynamic weather effects change how you approach each new dangerous situation

  • Hunt for treasure how you want with both solo and cooperative expeditions

  • Persistent player profiles let you build on your past successes (and failures) by unlocking new places to explore, new items to buy, and new ways to increase your ability to get out alive

name: Compass Lost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play. System requirements for this game may change over time.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU @ 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play. System requirements for this game may change over time.

short_description: Explore procedurally generated ancient ruins filled with traps, puzzles, and treasure! Seek fame and fortune alone or with a party but beware! Signs of ancient curses are everywhere and escaping with your plunder and your life may prove to be the ultimate challenge.
